admin.device.delete.error.detail: The device {{deviceId}} could not be deleted.
admin.device.dialog.add.text1: In this dialog you can add a device to the automatic replication process.
admin.device.dialog.add.text2: To do this insert the DeviceId of the regarding device into the following input text field and press the button "Add" afterwards.
admin.device.dialog.add.title: Add device
admin.device.dialog.delete.text2: In this dialog you have the possibility to delete all device related data stored in the cloud!!!
admin.device.dialog.delete.text4: If you really want to execute the deletion process, then proceed as follows:
admin.device.dialog.delete.text5: Insert the text "delete" followed by a period (.) followed by the DeviceId of the device to be deleted into the following input text field.
admin.device.dialog.delete.text8: The deletion process can last several minutes.
admin.device.dialog.delete.text9: After completion the regarding device is automatically removed from the displayed device list.
admin.device.dialog.delete.title: Delete device data

landing.caption.oee: Understand how good your production really is - with the OEE overview.
landing.caption.production: Your entire production - visualized for you.
landing.header.contact: Is your production ready for digitization?
landing.popup.text.failure-1: With our tool FailureAnalysis you can monitor and collectively visualize all faults within your production:
landing.popup.text.failure-2: Use dashboards, automated alerts, and predictive analytics to maximize plant efficiency
landing.popup.text.machine-1: Use the MachineAnalysis tool to keep a constant eye on your plant parameters and benefit from
landing.popup.text.machine-4: The problem: Many plants lack an overview of important information in order to maintain them efficiently
landing.popup.text.machine-5: A central analysis of the most important machine data makes it possible to make maintenance-related predictions. Knowing when wear parts next need to be replaced
landing.popup.text.machine-6: to prevent production errors and unplanned machine downtime
landing.popup.text.machine-7: gives you a decisive market advantage
landing.popup.text.maintenance-3: , you always keep track of completed and future maintenance tasks
landing.popup.text.maintenance-4: Integrate your own maintenance instructions and information material to create a comprehensive
landing.popup.text.maintenance-6: . Your employees only need one access to MyAnts and have all relevant information at hand
landing.popup.text.maintenance-7: This allows you to optimally plan necessary maintenance and minimize unnecessary machine downtime
landing.popup.text.oee-3: of your production is the basis for further analyses. Our basic tool provides you with in-depth insights into your production.
landing.popup.text.oee-4: Use the trend display to identify patterns over the course of the last few weeks and improve your production in the medium term.
landing.popup.text.oee-5: An overview is not enough? No problem: With
landing.popup.text.oee-6: you can dive down to the details and break down exactly where your productivity is suffering
landing.popup.text.planing-3: , you can effortlessly integrate your ERP system with MyAnts and benefit from a clear display of all pending orders
landing.popup.text.planing-4: MyAnts compares the orders with the inserted tools and the current maintenance status and automatically informs you when action is required
landing.popup.text.planing-5: Always keep track of the past and future utilization of your machines
landing.popup.text.production-1: With our ProductionAnalysis tool, you can
landing.popup.text.production-12: , you maintain an overview in every situation and thus increase the quality of your work processes in the long term
landing.popup.text.production-15: and back up your decision making with retrospective data analytics
landing.popup.text.production-3: and optimize your performance in the long term
landing.popup.text.production-9: to avoid time-consuming and costly errors
landing.text.cards.machine-analysis-3: through the clear display of your plant parameters.
landing.text.cards.maintenance-3: that are due and those that have been completed.
landing.text.cards.oee-3: , you always maintain an overview of the productivity of your plant.
landing.text.cards.production-analysis-3: and optimize your performance in the long term.
landing.text.cards.production-planing-1: Plan your production with intelligent support and keep
landing.text.contact.article-2: Just write us your inquiry and we will contact you.
landing.text.contact.article-3: We are looking forward to your message.
landing.text.example.article-2: that MyAnts provides you with is the Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE). See at a glance which of your machines need your attention and which aspects of production have the greatest potential for improvement.
landing.text.example.oee.plannedTime: Net operating time / Planned operating time
landing.text.functions.article-1: Based on the modular analysis tool ANTS from Possehl Analytics,
landing.text.functions.article-2: determines the key figures of your production and prepares them for you in an understandable way.
landing.text.functions.article-3: Navigate from clear production dashboards to the individual machine thanks to intuitive top-down design.
landing.text.functions.article-4: Whether a rough overview or detailed individual analyses: With MyAnts you make your production completely transparent and can optimize it in a targeted manner!
landing.text.modules: offers a wide range of analysis modules: you only pay for what you really need!
landing.text.myants.article-1: is an intelligent analysis platform that allows you to keep track of your production at all times.
landing.text.myants.article-2: Fully utilize the potential of your machine data and save not only time but also money with the help of state-of-the-art software.
landing.text.slogan: Let your data work for you.
contactform.apreciate.message: We are looking forward to your message!
